alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 10:27AM CDT until March 30 at 10:32AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following locations along the Meramec River in Missouri... Near Steelville. Near Sullivan. Near Eureka. At Pacific. At Valley Park. Near Arnold. At Fenton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.5 feet, Hornecker Road is closed near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 17.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 26.0 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Eureka 19.0 17.7 21.8 26.0 23.9 18.1 9.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
